description: A high-energy arcade math drill game for 4th-grade level focused on multiplication and division mastery.
goal: Improve multiplication and division fluency through a gamified 60-second sprint with adaptive difficulty.
requirements: Combo system: 5 correct answers triggers 'Heat Mode' multiplier
Smart problem generation: adaptive weighting for frequently missed facts
Multiplication facts (0-12) and related division facts
Post-game report showing accuracy and 'Tricky Facts'
Integration with platform's use-game-session and localStorage for high scores
constraints: Must follow existing game architecture (lib/ logic layer + UI layer)
No breaking changes to existing game registry or session context
